title: T206 Dark Cap Matty for Sale!
author: drdduet

posts.post_title: T206 Dark Cap Matty for Sale!
posts.post_content:
For Sale T206 dark cap Matty in PSA 4 (MK).  Great card with Piedmont 350 reverse.  Great colors and excellent centering.  6 written on reverse in pencil is reason for (MK).  Price is $450. SOLD

Contact me at [url]darren.duet@chouest.com[/url] for scans and or inquiries.
